description:
Merem Solomon, also known as "Crown", is the 20th of the 27 Dead Apostle Ancestors and the fifth member of the Burial Agency. He is an independent Apostle with the appearance of a fourteen year old.
He is immensely grateful towards Crimson Moon Brunestud for turning him into a vampire, a feeling that has been, since Crimson Moon`s destruction, directed towards his "successor", http://anidb.net/ch37 [Arcueid Brunestud].
A collector of treasures, he joined the http://anidb.net/ch1952 [Church] in order to have access to holy relics.
Source: typemoon.wikia.com
name: Merem Solomon
